hypothesis_content.title: Intraday VWAP Reversion with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC price deviates >1.5% from its intraday VWAP (volume-weighted average price) on 1-hour chart during NEUTRAL regime, and volume on deviation candles is below 20-period average, taking contrarian position yields reversion to VWAP within 8 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: VWAP represents average traded price. Low-volume deviations suggest lack of conviction, often attracting algorithmic mean-reversion strategies and profit-taking.
entry_conditions: Volume on deviation candle(s) < 20-period volume MA
No major news events in past 2 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.3% of VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Additional 1% adverse move beyond entry deviation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Low-volume deviations continue directionally >60% of time, or high-volume deviations would perform better (indicating trend continuation).
